item.title: Random sampling
item.description: The problem: you want to generate a random collection of letters. letters %>% sample(size = 4) %>% paste0(collapse = “”) ## [1] “dlcz” Great. Now do it 10 times. letters %>% sample(size = 4) %>% paste0(collapse = “”) %>% rep(8) ## [1] “rwuj” “rwuj” “rwuj” “rwuj” “rwuj” “rwuj” “rwuj” “rwuj” üòñ. Why am I like this.
